description: Verify that the user can select the departure city.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The departure city field is empty or pre-filled
testing_steps: Tap on the departure city field.
Verify that a list of cities is displayed.
Select a city from the list.
Verify that the selected city is displayed in the departure city field.

description: Verify that the user can select the arrival city.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The arrival city field is empty or pre-filled
testing_steps: Tap on the arrival city field.
Verify that a list of cities is displayed.
Select a city from the list.
Verify that the selected city is displayed in the arrival city field.

description: Verify that the user can select the date of travel.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The date of travel field is empty or pre-filled
testing_steps: Tap on the date of travel field.
Verify that a calendar is displayed.
Select a date from the calendar.
Verify that the selected date is displayed in the date of travel field.

description: Verify that the user can swap the departure and arrival cities.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
Both departure and arrival cities are selected
testing_steps: Tap on the swap button.
Verify that the departure and arrival cities are swapped in their respective fields.

description: Verify that the user can search for bus tickets.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The departure and arrival cities, and the date of travel are selected
testing_steps: Tap on the search button.
Verify that the app navigates to the search results screen.
Verify that the search results screen displays a list of available buses for the selected route and date.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the bus hire section.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the "Bus Hire" button.
Verify that the app navigates to the bus hire screen.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the rPool section.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the "rPool" button.
Verify that the app navigates to the rPool screen.

description: Verify that the user can view COVID-19 travel guidelines.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the "READ GUIDELINES" button within the COVID-19 Travel Guidelines section.
Verify that the app displays the COVID-19 travel guidelines.

description: Verify that the user can view recent searches.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The user has previously searched for bus tickets
testing_steps: Scroll down to the "RECENT SEARCHES" section.
Verify that the app displays a list of recent searches made by the user.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the Home screen.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the Home button in the bottom navigation bar.
Verify that the app navigates to the Home screen.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the My Bookings screen.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the My Bookings button in the bottom navigation bar.
Verify that the app navigates to the My Bookings screen.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the Help screen.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the Help button in the bottom navigation bar.
Verify that the app navigates to the Help screen.

description: Verify that the user can navigate to the My Account screen.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Tap on the My Account button in the bottom navigation bar.
Verify that the app navigates to the My Account screen.

description: Verify that the Today and Tomorrow buttons function correctly.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
testing_steps: Tap on the "TODAY" button.
Verify that the date field updates to the current date.
Tap on the "TOMORROW" button.
Verify that the date field updates to the next day's date.

description: Verify that tapping a recent search populates the search fields.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen.
The user has previous searches in the "RECENT SEARCHES" section
testing_steps: Tap on a recent search entry in the "RECENT SEARCHES" section.
Verify that the departure city, arrival city, and date fields are populated with the information from the selected recent search.

description: Verify that the app displays an error message if the departure and arrival cities are the same.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Select the same city as both the departure and arrival city.
Tap on the "SEARCH" button.
Verify that the app displays an appropriate error message indicating that the departure and arrival cities cannot be the same.

description: Verify that the app displays an error message for invalid date selections.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Attempt to select a past date in the date field.
Verify that the app either prevents the selection or displays an appropriate error message.
Attempt to select a date too far in the future.
Verify that the app either prevents the selection or displays an appropriate error message, if there are any limitations on future booking dates.

description: Verify that the "Your safety is our aim" banner is displayed prominently.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Verify that the banner containing the text "Your safety is our aim" is clearly visible on the screen.

description: Verify that the app remembers the user's last selected departure and arrival cities.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user has previously searched for bus tickets
testing_steps: Open the app and navigate to the bus ticket booking screen.
Verify that the departure and arrival city fields are pre-filled with the user's last selections.

description: Verify that the app does not allow booking tickets without selecting both departure and arrival cities.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Leave the departure city field empty.
Select an arrival city.
Select a travel date.
Tap on the "SEARCH" button.
Verify that the app displays an error message and does not proceed with the search.
Repeat steps 1-5, this time leaving the arrival city field empty and selecting a departure city.
Verify that the app displays an error message and does not proceed with the search.

description: Verify that the app handles network connectivity issues gracefully.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and running.
The user is on the bus ticket booking screen
testing_steps: Turn off the device's internet connection.
Attempt to search for bus tickets.
Verify that the app displays an appropriate error message indicating the lack of internet connectivity.
Turn the device's internet connection back on.
Retry the search.
Verify that the app functions normally and displays the search results.
